titleStmt.title: Heart-sick, wounded England and Ireland healed and saved now, not too good news to be true, by the appearance of an old man, a state-physitian, discovering all (or at least, very many) of its epidemical diseases, by prescribing and applying, not hurtful, poysonous, dear, forreign, French, fraudulent drugs, but wholesome, sound, cheap, faithful, domestick, English simples.
